pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.52: [Sp.1.400](): _Sāṭakapattoti lohapattasadiso susaṇṭhāno succhavi siniddho bhamaravaṇṇo mattikāpatto vuccati_, “_Sāṭakapatta_: what is meant is a clay bowl like an iron bowl, which is well-formed, has a nice and glossy surface, and has the color of a bee.” The color of a bee is black. [Thī.252](): _Kāḷakā bhamaravaṇṇasādisā_, “Black like the color of a bee.”
